header.title: ROI Calculator
header.subtitle: Calculate your cold outreach campaign return on investment across multiple channels
header.shuffleScenarioTooltip: Load a random realistic scenario to test the calculator

validation.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in the following required fields to see calculations:

calculationBreakdown.title: Calculation Breakdown
calculationBreakdown.subtitle: See how your inputs flow through the system
calculationBreakdown.step1Description: mailboxes × emails/day × working days × sequence steps
calculationBreakdown.understandingPoint1: If changing mailboxes doesn't affect results, check your conversion rates (open rate, reply rate, etc.)
calculationBreakdown.understandingPoint2: Low conversion rates create bottlenecks - even 10x more emails won't help if only 0.1% convert
calculationBreakdown.understandingPoint3: The "Ratio per positive reply" is critical - it determines how many positive replies become opportunities
calculationBreakdown.understandingPoint4: Your close rate affects how many opportunities become actual deals

revenueSetup.title: Revenue Setup
revenueSetup.domainsTooltip: Number of unique domains you'll use for sending emails. Using multiple domains helps protect your sender reputation.
revenueSetup.sendingMailboxesTooltip: Total number of email accounts you'll use to send campaigns. More mailboxes = higher volume capacity.
revenueSetup.emailsPerDayTooltip: How many emails each mailbox sends daily. Keep this under 50 to maintain good deliverability and avoid spam filters.
revenueSetup.workingDaysTooltip: Number of business days per month you'll be sending emails. Typically 20-22 days (excluding weekends).
revenueSetup.sequenceStepsTooltip: Number of follow-up emails in your sequence. Example: 1 initial email + 2 follow-ups = 3 steps total.

performanceMetrics.title: Performance Metrics
performanceMetrics.ratioPerReplyTooltip: How many emails you need to send to get 1 positive reply. Example: 300 means 1 interested reply per 300 emails sent.
performanceMetrics.closeRateTooltip: Percentage of opportunities that your sales team converts into paying customers. Example: 70% means 7 out of 10 opportunities close.
performanceMetrics.dealValueLTVTooltip: Lifetime Value - the total revenue you expect from one customer over their entire relationship with your business.

advancedMetrics.title: Advanced Metrics
advancedMetrics.description: Enable to see detailed email performance metrics on the right panel
advancedMetrics.openRateTooltip: Percentage of emails that get opened. Industry average: 40-60%. Lower rates indicate deliverability issues.
advancedMetrics.replyRateTooltip: Percentage of emails that get any reply (positive or negative). Industry average: 1-5%.
advancedMetrics.positiveReplyRateTooltip: Of all replies, what percentage are positive/interested? Typically 20-40% of total replies.
advancedMetrics.meetingBookRateTooltip: Percentage of positive replies that convert to booked meetings. Industry average: 40-60%.
advancedMetrics.bounceRateTooltip: Percentage of emails that bounce (invalid addresses). Keep under 5% to maintain sender reputation.
advancedMetrics.unsubscribeRateTooltip: Percentage of recipients who unsubscribe. Keep under 1% for healthy campaigns.
advancedMetrics.salesCycleLengthTooltip: Average number of days from first contact to closed deal. Helps calculate time to revenue.
advancedMetrics.churnRateTooltip: Percentage of customers who cancel each month. Important for calculating true LTV.

costStructure.title: Cost Structure
costStructure.domainCostTooltip: Monthly cost for all your domains. Typically $10-15 per domain per year, so divide annual cost by 12.
costStructure.mailboxCostTooltip: Monthly cost for all email accounts. Google Workspace or similar services typically cost $6-12 per mailbox per month.
costStructure.deliveryCostTooltip: Monthly cost for email warmup services and deliverability tools to ensure your emails reach the inbox, not spam.
costStructure.softwareCostTooltip: Monthly cost for cold email software platforms (like Instantly, Smartlead, etc.) used to manage and automate campaigns.
costStructure.engineerCostTooltip: Monthly salary/cost for your Go-To-Market engineer or specialist who manages the cold email infrastructure and campaigns.
costStructure.warmupCostTooltip: Monthly cost for warming up new email accounts to build sender reputation. Typically $20-50 per mailbox.
costStructure.dataProviderCostTooltip: Monthly cost for lead data providers (Apollo, ZoomInfo, etc.) to source quality contact lists.
costStructure.copywriterCostTooltip: Monthly cost for professional copywriting services to create high-converting email sequences.

salesCommission.title: Sales Commission
salesCommission.description: Enable to see commission impact analysis on the right panel
salesCommission.commissionTypePercentageDesc: Sales reps earn a percentage of each closed deal
salesCommission.commissionTypeFlatDesc: Sales reps earn a fixed amount per closed deal
salesCommission.commissionRateTooltip: Percentage of deal value paid to sales reps. Industry standard: 10-20% for B2B sales, 5-10% for high-ticket items.
salesCommission.commissionPerDealTooltip: Fixed amount paid to sales reps per closed deal. Common for standardized products or services.

agencyComparison.title: Agency Comparison
agencyComparison.description: Enable to compare in-house vs agency costs on the right panel
agencyComparison.setupFeeTooltip: One-time setup fee charged by agencies to onboard and configure your cold email campaigns.
agencyComparison.monthlyRetainerTooltip: Fixed monthly fee charged by agencies for managing your cold email campaigns. Typically $5,000-$15,000/month.
agencyComparison.perLeadFeeTooltip: Additional cost per qualified lead/opportunity generated. Typically $100-$300 per lead depending on industry.

coldCalling.title: Cold Calling
coldCalling.description: Enable to add cold calling metrics and see combined channel performance
coldCalling.callsPerDayTooltip: Number of outbound calls your team makes per day. Industry average: 40-80 calls/day.
coldCalling.connectRateTooltip: Percentage of calls where you reach a decision maker. Industry average: 20-40%.
coldCalling.callToMeetingRateTooltip: Percentage of connected calls that result in a booked meeting. Industry average: 10-20%.
coldCalling.callingDaysPerMonthTooltip: Number of days per month dedicated to cold calling.
coldCalling.softwareCostTooltip: Monthly cost for calling software (e.g., Aircall, RingCentral, Dialpad).
coldCalling.salaryCostTooltip: Monthly salary or cost for the person making cold calls.

linkedInOutreach.title: LinkedIn Outreach
linkedInOutreach.description: Enable to add LinkedIn outreach metrics and see combined channel performance
linkedInOutreach.connectionsPerDayTooltip: Number of LinkedIn connection requests sent per day. LinkedIn limit: ~100/week.
linkedInOutreach.acceptRateTooltip: Percentage of connection requests that get accepted. Industry average: 20-40%.
linkedInOutreach.replyRateTooltip: Percentage of accepted connections that reply to your message. Industry average: 5-15%.
linkedInOutreach.meetingBookingRateTooltip: Percentage of replies that convert to booked meetings. Industry average: 15-30%.
linkedInOutreach.toolCostTooltip: Monthly cost for LinkedIn automation tools (e.g., Sales Navigator, Dux-Soup).
linkedInOutreach.managerCostTooltip: Monthly salary or cost for the person managing LinkedIn outreach.

referralProgram.title: Referral Program
referralProgram.description: Enable to add referral program metrics and see combined channel performance
referralProgram.referralsPerMonthTooltip: Number of qualified referrals you expect to receive per month.
referralProgram.conversionRateTooltip: Percentage of referrals that convert to meetings. Referrals typically convert at 30-50%.
referralProgram.incentiveCostTooltip: Amount paid to the referrer for each successful deal closed.
referralProgram.programCostTooltip: Monthly cost to manage and promote your referral program.

suggestions.criticalDescription: Address these issues to improve profitability
suggestions.optimizationDescription: Tips to improve your campaign performance
suggestions.campaignLoss: Your campaign is operating at a loss (including all channels)
suggestions.campaignLossAction: Reduce costs or improve conversion rates across all channels to achieve profitability
suggestions.ltvCacBelow1Action: Increase deal size, reduce acquisition costs, or improve close rates
suggestions.ltvCacBelow3: LTV/CAC ratio should be 3:1 or higher for healthy growth
suggestions.ltvCacBelow3Action: Focus on increasing customer lifetime value or reducing CAC
suggestions.openRateLowAction: Improve subject lines, check deliverability, or warm up domains properly
suggestions.replyRateLowAction: Improve email copy, better targeting, or refine your ICP (Ideal Customer Profile)
suggestions.bounceRateHighAction: Use better data providers, verify emails before sending, or clean your lists
suggestions.emailsPerDayHighAction: Reduce to 30-50 emails per day per mailbox for better deliverability
suggestions.callConnectRateLowAction: Improve your calling script, target better leads, or optimize calling times
suggestions.callToMeetingRateLowAction: Enhance your post-connection pitch or offer more compelling meeting incentives
suggestions.linkedInAcceptRateLowAction: Personalize connection requests, ensure your profile is optimized, or target relevant connections
suggestions.linkedInReplyRateLowAction: Craft engaging initial messages after connection, and follow up strategically
suggestions.linkedInMeetingRateLowAction: Improve your value proposition and call to action in messages
suggestions.highestCostAction: Consider optimizing this cost or improving output to justify the expense
suggestions.agencySavingsAction: Consider outsourcing to an agency instead of building in-house
suggestions.closeRateLowAction: Improve sales process, qualify leads better, or provide sales training
suggestions.emailsPerDayPerMailboxMayTrigger: emails/day per mailbox may trigger spam filters
suggestions.isTooHigh: is too high - damages sender reputation

financialSummary.title: Financial Summary
financialSummary.description: Monthly income breakdown after all costs

commissionImpact.title: Commission Impact Analysis
commissionImpact.description: How commission affects your bottom line

multiChannelPerformance.title: Multi-Channel Performance
multiChannelPerformance.description: Combined metrics across all enabled channels

emailPerformanceMetrics.title: Email Performance Metrics
emailPerformanceMetrics.description: Your email outreach volume and reach
